about_the_game:
At the heart of the experience lies the building of your inventory and the strategic management of your backpack. With each turn, you'll draw a new item from your inventory, presenting you with a delightful decision. Careful placement is key, as the position of your items can dramatically impact their effectiveness in the
battle. Take solace in the knowledge that your health will be restored between battles, allowing you to face each challenge with renewed vigor and determination. As you move further, you'll encounter a diverse array of enemies and strong bosses. Engage in intense, strategic combat, utilizing your carefully curated backpack to overcome the obstacles that stand in your way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.

short_description: Draw an item each turn and place it carefully to maximize its power. Engage in battles against a variety of enemies and bosses, using your backpack's contents to overcome them.
